label: Gil-Santana, Hélcio R.  2015. Two new species of Phasmatocoris Breddin from Brazil, and description of the male of Phasmatocoris borgmeieri (Wygodzinsky) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae: Emesinae). Zootaxa 4059(1): 51–70.
